title: Get Pods
description: List all pods in the namespace

title: Get Services
description: List all services in the namespace

title: Pod Logs
description: Print the logs for a container in a pod

title: Describe Pod
description: Show details of a specific pod

title: Apply YAML
description: Apply a configuration to a resource by filename or stdin

title: Delete Resource
description: Delete resources by filenames, stdin, resources and names

title: Exec into Pod
description: Execute a command in a container

title: Port Forward
description: Forward one or more local ports to a pod
